articles.author: Sara Murray and Jason Morris, CNN
articles.title: Giuliani told he is a target in Georgia 2020 presidential election probe
articles.description: Rudy Giuliani has been told by prosecutors in Georgia that he is a target of the special purpose grand jury investigating whether former President Donald Trump and his allies violated the law in their efforts to flip the 2020 election results in Georgia.

articles.author: Ellie Kaufman, CNN
articles.title: US-led coalition forces repel drone attack near base in Syria
articles.description: US-led coalition forces repelled multiple drones near the US-led coalition At-Tanf base in Syria Monday, according to a press release from the coalition.
articles.content:
(CNN)US-led coalition forces repelled multiple drones near the US-led coalition At-Tanf base in Syria Monday, according to a press release from the coalition.

articles.title: Federal judge rules that Graham must testify in Georgia 2020 investigation
articles.description: A federal judge in Atlanta has denied GOP Sen. Lindsey Graham's motion to quash a subpoena, ruling that he must testify before a Fulton County grand jury investigating former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the 2020 presidential election in Georg…

articles.title: Haberman reveals the message Trump tried sending to Garland   - CNN Video
articles.description: The New York Times' Maggie Haberman explains the message former President Donald Trump sent to the Department of Justice through an intermediary in the wake of the Mar-a-Lago search.

articles.title: Analysis: American recession fears collide with reality
articles.description: The American economy didn't get the memo that it's supposed to already be in a recession.

articles.title: Cheney tries to hold on in tough Wyoming primary reshaped by Trump
articles.description: Six years ago, when Rep. Liz Cheney first ran for Wyoming's lone House seat, Nicholas Houfek said he saw the long-time Virginia resident, who had purchased a home in Jackson Hole four years earlier, as a "carpetbagger."
